original_text: Teach them to your children. Talk about them when you sit together at home. Talk about them as you walk along the road, when you lie down and when you get up.
korean_text: 또 그것을 너희의 자녀에게 가르치며 집에 앉아 있을 때에든지, 길을 갈 때에든지, 누워 있을 때에든지, 일어날 때에든지 이 말씀을 강론하고

sentences.original_text: when you sit together at home.
Talk about them as you walk along the road,
sentences.korean_translation: 길을 따라 걸을 때 그것들에 대해 이야기하십시오
